attributes.action: Legalise marijuana. Introduce a tax and require a license to sell it.
attributes.additional_details: The legalisation will minimise crimes and antisocial behaviour involving marijuana. It will require sensible and responsible individuals to have a license too sell and produce marijuana, stopping the need for people to commit crime to purchase it and become involved in gang crimes and activity surrounding the growing and selling of marijuana.
attributes.background: Introduce license for growing, producing and selling marijuana plants and products. Tax it and sell it in dispensaries.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Reassess the classification of Cannabis and decriminalize it. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700385
